response.original_title: Puppet Club: The Thirteen Days of Yule
response.overview: When Tribal Chant Man announces to the fellows in the monkey house that they are celebrating Yule instead of Christmas, everyone starts feeling blue. The Yule Lads over in Iceland, however, are ecstatic. Every day until Yuletide, one of the lads will come to the house and throw off their holiday groove. Now, King, Ergle the Wise, Monkey, Michael Yackson and Tribal Chant Man have to find a way to overcome this Yulish threat in this lasting holiday classic.
response.tagline: On the first day of Yule, the Yule Lads gave to meâ€¦
response.title: Puppet Club: The Thirteen Days of Yule
